definition: (classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)

pinyin: Zhi2 ye4 Gao1 er3 fu1 qiu2 Xie2 hui4

sentences.chinese: 他是出色的高尔夫球手。

sentences.english: They can be as tiny as a grain of sand or as large as a golf ball.
sentences.chinese: 大小可细如沙粒也可大似高尔夫球。

sentences.english: Laze on the white-sand beach or golf on two world-ranked courses.
sentences.chinese: 在白沙滩或高尔夫球拉则在两个世界排名课程。

sentences.english: There is golf-ball-size hail in New Jersey today.
sentences.chinese: 新泽西州今日下起高尔夫球大小的冰雹。

sentences.english: I could go and play some golf.
sentences.chinese: 我能去打一些高尔夫球。

sentences.english: "People can play golf anywhere, " he said.
sentences.chinese: “人们在哪都能玩高尔夫球，”他说。

sentences.english: In soccer-mad Brazil, it heavily promoted golf clubs. In sweltering Mexico, it pushed ice skates.
sentences.chinese: 在对足球疯狂的巴西，它积极的促销高尔夫球棒。

sentences.english: Designed for riveting golf bag bottom.
sentences.chinese: 适用于适用于高尔夫球袋底部的铆合。

sentences.english: We consult him whether Russians like golf or not.
sentences.chinese: 我们询问他俄国人是否会喜欢高尔夫球。

sentences.english: So do golfers rate seashore paspalum as a birdie or a bogie?
sentences.chinese: 那么打高尔夫球的人对海滨雀稗评价如何呢？

sentences.english: You must play a lot of golf after you get your sermons ready.
sentences.chinese: 写完讲章后，你必定很多时间打高尔夫球吧。

sentences.english: Dad says Froggy's too little for golf.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸说弗罗吉的高尔夫球运动太少。

sentences.english: Classic-fitting golf pant in soft, lightweight cotton tissue chino.
sentences.chinese: 经典装修高尔夫球裤，柔软，轻便的棉花组织奇诺。

sentences.english: The golf buddies start to laugh.
sentences.chinese: 其他几位高尔夫球友哈哈笑了起来。

sentences.english: He used to play tennis, but now he's switched to golf.
sentences.chinese: 他过去常去打网球，但现在改打高尔夫球了。

definition: table tennis/table tennis ball (Tw)/billiards/pool/snooker (HK, Singapore, Malaysia)
football played with oval-shaped ball (rugby, American football, Australian rules etc)
